channel.title: Traffic Light on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Traffic Light on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-191 South at US-491
item.description: US-191 South at US-491. Use US-491 east for Cortez (Colorado); continue south on US-191 for Blanding. This is the northern end of US-491. Also US-491 east for the (Utah) Port of Entry.

item.title: US-287 South at WY-789
item.description: US-287 South at WY-789. Turn left for WY-789 north to Riverton. Continue ahead for US-287/WY-789 South to WY-28, Rawlins, and Rock Springs.

item.title: CA-20 East Traffic Must Stop Ahead
item.description: CA-20 East approaching CA-53 south. This intersection is controlled by a stop sign on CA-20.
